name: Perfect Breakfast
author: Britty
summary: A delicious combination of unique favors that came together by my mom on accident to make this very yummy breakfast! Hope others enjoy as much as we do!
ingredients: ½  avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
directions: Melt 2 teaspoons butter in a skillet over medium heat; add the eggs
Allow the egg whites to cook until mostly firm before breaking the yolks; continue cooking until eggs are completely cooked and no longer runny, 2 to 3 minutes
Spread one side of toasted sourdough bread slice with Dijon mustard
Arrange avocado slice onto the mustard
